data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Galinskaya, Tatiana V., Ovtshinnikova, Olga G. (2015): Musculature of the male genitalia in Rivellia (Diptera: Platystomatidae). ZooKeys 545: 149-158, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.545.6702, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.545.6702
